00013 // Data Structure for this object
00014 typedef struct _map{
00015         t_object                ob;     
00016         void                    *obex;
00017         void                    *outlet;
00018         t_symbol                *attr_function;
00019         double                  attr_inputMin;
00020         double                  attr_inputMax;
00021         double                  attr_outputMin;
00022         double                  attr_outputMax;
00023         double                  a, b;                           // Coefficients used for normalizing input
00024         double                  c, d;                           // Coefficients used for scaling normalized output
00025         FunctionUnit    *functionUnit;
00026         bool                    valid;                          // true if the functionUnit can be used
00027 } t_map;
00028

00032 void            map_free(t_map *obj);
00033 void            map_assist(t_map *obj, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);
00034 void            map_int(t_map *obj, long x);
00035 void            map_float(t_map *obj, double x);
00036 void            map_getFunctions(t_map *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00037 void            map_getParameter(t_map *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00038 void            map_getFunctionParameters(t_map *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00039 void            map_setParameter(t_map *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv);

00053 /************************************************************************************/
00054 // Main() Function
00055 
00056 int main(void)                          // main recieves a copy of the Max function macros table
00057 {
00058         t_class *c;
00059         
00060         jamoma_init();
00061 
00062         // Define our class
00063         c = class_new("jcom.map",(method)map_new, (method)map_free, (short)sizeof(t_map), (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00064         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_map, obex));
00065 
00066         // Make methods accessible for our class: 
00067         class_addmethod(c, (method)map_int,                                             "int", A_GIMME, 0L);
00068         class_addmethod(c, (method)map_float,                                   "float", A_GIMME, 0L);
00069         class_addmethod(c, (method)map_getFunctions,                    "functions.get", A_GIMME, 0);
00070         class_addmethod(c, (method)map_getParameter,                    "parameter.get", A_GIMME, 0);
00071         class_addmethod(c, (method)map_getFunctionParameters,   "function.parameters.get", A_GIMME, 0);
00072         class_addmethod(c, (method)map_setParameter,                    "parameter", A_GIMME, 0);
00073         class_addmethod(c, (method)map_assist,                                  "assist", A_CANT, 0L); 
00074     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_dumpout,                     "dumpout", A_CANT,0);  
00075     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_quickref,            "quickref", A_CANT, 0);
00076 
00077         // ATTRIBUTE: set the function to use
00078         class_addattr(c, 
00079                 attr_offset_new("function", _sym_symbol, 0,
00080                 (method)0, (method)map_setFunction, calcoffset(t_map, attr_function)));
00081         // ATTRIBUTE: set the input minimum value
00082         class_addattr(c,
00083                 attr_offset_new("inputMin", _sym_float64, 0,
00084                 (method)0, (method)map_setInputMin, calcoffset(t_map, attr_inputMin)));
00085         // ATTRIBUTE: set the input maximum value
00086         class_addattr(c,
00087                 attr_offset_new("inputMax", _sym_float64, 0,
00088                 (method)0, (method)map_setInputMax, calcoffset(t_map, attr_inputMax))); 
00089                 
00090         // ATTRIBUTE: set the output minimum value
00091         class_addattr(c,
00092                 attr_offset_new("outputMin", _sym_float64, 0,
00093                 (method)0, (method)map_setOutputMin, calcoffset(t_map, attr_outputMin)));
00094         // ATTRIBUTE: set the output maximum value
00095         class_addattr(c,
00096                 attr_offset_new("outputMax", _sym_float64, 0,
00097                 (method)0, (method)map_setOutputMax, calcoffset(t_map, attr_outputMax)));
00098 
00099         // Finalize our class
00100         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00101         map_class = c;
00102         return 0;
00103 }

00106 /************************************************************************************/
00107 // Object Life
00108 
00109 void *map_new(t_symbol *name, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00110 {
00111         t_map *obj;                                                                     // Declare an object (based on our struct)
00112 
00113         obj = (t_map *)object_alloc(map_class);         // Create object, store pointer to it (get 1 inlet free)
00114         if(obj){
00115                 object_obex_store((void *)obj, _sym_dumpout, (object *)outlet_new(obj,NULL));
00116             obj->outlet = outlet_new(obj, 0);
00117                 obj->attr_function = _sym_nothing;
00118                 obj->attr_inputMin = 0;
00119                 obj->attr_inputMax = 1;
00120                 obj->attr_outputMin = 0;
00121                 obj->attr_outputMax = 1;
00122                 obj->functionUnit = NULL;
00123                 obj->valid = false;
00124                 attr_args_process(obj, argc, argv);
00125                 map_scaleInput(obj);
00126                 map_scaleOutput(obj);
00127                 if(!obj->functionUnit)
00128                         object_attr_setsym(obj, gensym("function"), gensym("linear"));
00129         }
00130         return obj;                                                                             // Return pointer to our instance
00131 }
00132 
00133 
00134 void map_free(t_map *obj)
00135 {
00136         if(obj->functionUnit)
00137                 delete obj->functionUnit;
00138 }

00141 /************************************************************************************/
00142 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00143 
00144 // Method for Assistance Messages
00145 void map_assist(t_map *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00146 {
00147         if(msg==1)                                                      // Inlets
00148                 strcpy(dst, "x");
00149         else if(msg==2){                                        // Outlets
00150                 switch(arg){
00151                         case 0: strcpy(dst, "y=f(x)"); break;
00152                         default: strcpy(dst, "dumpout"); break;
00153                 }
00154         }
00155 }
00156 
00157 
00158 void map_int(t_map *obj, long x)
00159 {
00160         map_float(obj, (double)x);
00161 }
00162 
00163 
00164 void map_float(t_map *obj, double x)
00165 {
00166         double y;
00167         
00168         if(obj->valid){
00169                 y = obj->c * obj->functionUnit->map(obj->a * x + obj->b) + obj->d;
00170                 outlet_float(obj->outlet, y);
00171         }
00172 }
00173 
00174 
00175 void map_getFunctions(t_map *obj, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00176 {
00177         t_atom          a[2];
00178         long            numFunctions = 0;
00179         long            i;
00180         TTValue         functionNames;
00181         TTSymbol        aName;
00182         
00183         atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("clear"));
00184         object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("functions"), 1, a);
00185         
00186         FunctionLib::getUnitNames(functionNames);
00187         numFunctions = functionNames.getNumValues();
00188         for(i=0; i<numFunctions; i++){
00189                 functionNames.get(i, aName);
00190                 atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("append"));
00191                 atom_setsym(a+1, gensym(aName));
00192                 object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("functions"), 2, a);
00193                 
00194                 atom_setsym(a, obj->attr_function);
00195                 object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("functions"), 1, a);
00196         }
00197 }
00198 
00199 
00200 void map_getParameter(t_map *obj, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00201 {
00202         t_atom          *a;
00203         TTSymbol        parameterName;
00204         TTValue         parameterValue;
00205         int                     numValues;
00206         int                     i;
00207         TTSymbol        tempSymbol;
00208         double          tempValue;
00209         
00210         if(!argc){
00211                 error("jcom.map: not enough arguments to parameter.get");
00212                 return;
00213         }
00214         
00215         parameterName = atom_getsym(argv)->s_name;
00216         obj->functionUnit->getAttributeValue(parameterName, parameterValue);
00217         numValues = parameterValue.getNumValues();
00218 
00219         if(numValues){
00220                 a = (t_atom *)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_atom) * (numValues+1));
00221                 // First list item is name of parameter
00222                 atom_setsym(a, gensym(parameterName));
00223                 // Next the whole shebang is copied
00224                 for(i=0; i<numValues; i++){
00225                         if(parameterValue.getType(i) == kTypeSymbol){
00226                                 parameterValue.get(i, tempSymbol);
00227                                 atom_setsym(a+i+1, gensym(tempSymbol));
00228                         }
00229                         else{
00230                                 parameterValue.get(i, tempValue);
00231                                 atom_setfloat(a+i+1, tempValue);
00232                         }
00233                 }
00234                 object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("current.parameter"), numValues+1, a);
00235         
00236                 // The pointer to an atom assign in the getParameter method needs to be freed.
00237                 sysmem_freeptr(a);
00238         }
00239 }
00240 
00241 void map_getFunctionParameters(t_map *obj, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00242 {
00243         t_atom          a[2];
00244         long            n;
00245         TTValue         names;
00246         TTSymbol        aName;
00247 
00248         atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("clear"));
00249         object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("function.parameters"), 1, a);
00250 
00251         obj->functionUnit->getAttributeNames(names);
00252         n = names.getNumValues();
00253         if(n){
00254                 for(int i=0; i<n; i++){
00255                         atom_setsym(a+0, gensym("append"));
00256                         names.get(i, aName);
00257                         atom_setsym(a+1, gensym(aName));
00258                         object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("function.parameters"), 2, a);
00259                 }
00260         }
00261         else
00262                 object_obex_dumpout(obj, gensym("function.parameters.get"), 0, 0);              // no parameters
00263 }

00267 
00268 void map_setParameter(t_map *obj, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00269 {
00270         TTSymbol        parameterName;
00271         TTValue         newValue;
00272         int                     i;
00273         
00274         if(argc < 2){
00275                 error("jcom.map: not enough arguments to setParameter");
00276                 return;
00277         }
00278         
00279         parameterName = atom_getsym(argv)->s_name;
00280         for(i=1; i<=(argc-1); i++){
00281                 if(argv[i].a_type == A_SYM)
00282                         newValue.append(TT(atom_getsym(argv+1)->s_name));
00283                 else
00284                         newValue.append(atom_getfloat(argv+i));
00285         }
00286         obj->functionUnit->setAttributeValue(parameterName, newValue);
00287 }

00290 // ATTRIBUTE:
00291 void map_doSetFunction(t_map *obj, t_symbol *newFunctionName)
00292 {
00293         obj->attr_function = newFunctionName;
00294         FunctionLib::createUnit(TT(obj->attr_function->s_name), &obj->functionUnit);
00295         obj->valid = true;
00296 }
00297 
00298 t_max_err map_setFunction(t_map *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00299 {
00300         obj->valid = false;     // prevent values from being processed by the function while it is in a state of flux
00301 //map_doSetFunction(obj, atom_getsym(argv));
00302         defer_low(obj, (method)map_doSetFunction, atom_getsym(argv), 0, NULL);
00303         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00304 }

00307 // ATTRIBUTE: Set input minimum
00308 t_max_err map_setInputMin(t_map *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00309 {
00310         obj->attr_inputMin = atom_getfloat(argv);
00311         map_scaleInput(obj);
00312         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00313 }
00314 
00315 
00316 // ATTRIBUTE: Set input maximum
00317 t_max_err map_setInputMax(t_map *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00318 {
00319         obj->attr_inputMax = atom_getfloat(argv);
00320         map_scaleInput(obj);
00321         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00322 }
00323 
00324 
00325 // Recalculate values to use for scaling of input values
00326 void map_scaleInput(t_map *obj)
00327 {
00328         // Prevent dividing by 0
00329         if (obj->attr_inputMin == obj->attr_inputMax)
00330                 {
00331                         obj->a = 1;
00332                         post("jcom.map: Same value used for input min and max.");
00333                 }
00334         else
00335                 obj->a = 1./(obj->attr_inputMax - obj->attr_inputMin);
00336         obj->b = -1 * obj->a * obj->attr_inputMin;
00337 }
00338 
00339 
00340 // ATTRIBUTE: Set output minimum
00341 t_max_err map_setOutputMin(t_map *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00342 {
00343         obj->attr_outputMin = atom_getfloat(argv);
00344         map_scaleOutput(obj);
00345         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00346 
00347 }
00348 
00349 
00350 // ATTRIBUTE: Set output maximum
00351 t_max_err map_setOutputMax(t_map *obj, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00352 {
00353         obj->attr_outputMax = atom_getfloat(argv);
00354         map_scaleOutput(obj);
00355         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00356 }
00357 
00358 
00359 // Recalculate values to use for scaling of output values
00360 void map_scaleOutput(t_map *obj)
00361 {
00362         obj->c = obj->attr_outputMax - obj->attr_outputMin;
00363         obj->d = obj->attr_outputMin;
00364 }
